sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Modal from 'react-modal' Modal.setAppElement('#root') const CustomModal = ({ isOpen, onRequestClose, item, vol }) => { if (!item || !vol) { return null } const productVolume = vol.find(volume => volume.id_good === item.id) return (

{item.name}

{item.general_info}

{productVolume && (

{productVolume.volume} мл

{productVolume.price} руб.

)}
) } export default CustomModal
